metadata.title: Selecting and cloning top sgRNAs using VBC score and GeCKO protocol

annotations.note: The top four sgRNAs were first selected on the basis of predictions using multilayered Vienna Bioactivity CRISPR (VBC) score.
The selected sgRNAs were subjected to the reporter assay to test editing efficiency.
sgRNAs were cloned into the reporter assay lentivirus construct (containing the dual sgRNA cassette: U6‑sgRNA1‑H1‑sgRNA2) using the GeCKO cloning protocol.
